course_title: Art as Work: Self, Community, and Practice
class_notes:
Same as THEA 329W-1


(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Open only to declared theater and dance majors and minors in their junior or senior year. Contact Sally Radell, sradell@emory.edu for a permission number.
course_description: This course explores the practical, aesthetic, and current issues of the performing arts as they relate to the development of individual artists and the communities that support their work. Focus areas include arts advocacy, grant writing, and the arts as a reflection of contemporary culture.
sections: Class Nbr: 3624, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: S. Radell, Status: Open
